exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall l : list A, permutation l [] -> l = []" on hypothesis of type "permutation l1 l2".
In environment A : Type a : A l : list A H : permutation (a :: a :: l) (a :: a :: l) Unable to unify "permutation [] []" with "permutation (a :: l) (a :: l)".

In environment A : Type a : A l1, l2 : list A H : permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) l0, l3, l4 : list A H0 : permutation (a :: l1) l3 H1 : permutation l3 (a :: l2) H2 : l0 = a :: l1 H3 : l4 = a :: l2 Unable to unify "permutation (?M1515 :: ?M1517) (?M1515 :: ?M1516)" with "permutation l1 (a :: l1)".

In environment A : Type H6 : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) H5 : permutation [] [] H4 : forall l : list A, permutation l [] -> l = [] a : A l1, l2 : list A H : permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) l3 : list A H0 : permutation (a :: l1) l3 H1 : permutation l3 (a :: l2) Unable to unify "permutation [] []" with "permutation l1 (a :: l1)".

In environment A : Type H7 : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) H3 : permutation [] [] H2 : forall l : list A, permutation l [] -> l = [] a : A l1, l2 : list A H : permutation (a :: l1) (a :: l2) l3 : list A H0 : permutation (a :: l1) l3 H1 : permutation l3 (a :: l2) Unable to unify "?M3881 = []" with "permutation l1 (a :: l1)".

original: intros a l1 l2 H. inversion H. subst. apply permutation_nil_inv in H1. subst. apply permutation_nil. apply permutation_trans with (l2 := a::l1). apply permutation_skip. apply permutation_nil. apply H2.
